word: God desires His people to bring into their homes all the peace and joy and love that it is possible for them to have. The love that they bring into the home, they will bring into the church. My brethren and sisters, you can bring the peace of heaven into the home and into the church, if you will sanctify to God the talent of speech.--Manuscript 26, July 15, 1886, "Evil-speaking," a sermon preached in Oslo, Norway.
